name: BookingShipment
description: Simplified shipment object that is to be used only for the distribution scope where only a subset of data is known priori to operational phase.

columns.name: expectedCommodity
columns.description: Expected commodity of the shipment as per Commodity Code list. Either this or expected HS code required

columns.name: expectedHScode
columns.description: Expected commodity of the shipment as per HS code (at least 6 digits). Either this or expectedCommodityCode required

columns.name: forBookingOptionRequest
columns.description: Reference to the BookingOptionRequest the information of the LogisticsObject is detailling

columns.name: pieceGroups
columns.description: Reference to the Piece groups of the shipment

columns.name: temperatureInstructions
columns.description: Temperature instructions if a specific range

columns.name: consolidationIndicator
columns.description: Indication if the shipment is a consolidation

columns.name: textualHandlingInstructions
columns.description: Strings to provide free text handling instructions such as SSR and OSI

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
